description: The Ribbed Tank from Carbon38 is a body-hugging crop top with a scoop neckline and back. A soon-to-be staple in both your workout ensemble and everyday wardrobe, this soft and textured top features a breathable shelf bra for bonus support.
This go-anywhere oversized linen shirt is so versatile, you’ll want one in every color we make. B
This chunky knit cardigan from Brochu Walker is classic comfort at its best. Cropped with a boxy fit and saddle sleeves, it's an effortless layer that easily transitions from season to season.

product_name: Wide Scoop Bra Tank in Melt
description: Introducing a new silhouette in our buttery-soft melt fabric, the Wide Scoop Bra Tank. Offering full coverage and a built in shelf bra, the neutral tank is sure to become a go-to staple in your everyday wardrobe.

The Carbon38 linen square neck tank is casual yet refined. The modern, boxy silhouette features a slightly cropped hem with a distinctive ladder trim inset and generous armholes for ultimate breathability. The contemporary square neckline is flattering and well-designed for seasonally warm weather. Destined to become your favorite summer top.

product_name: Off Shoulder Sweatshirt in French Terry
description: The Off Shoulder Sweatshirt from Carbon38 adds plenty of cool comfort to your wardrobe. With a roomy fit, a slouchy silhouette, and a raw-edged asymmetrical neckline, this French terry sweatshirt keeps things effortlessly laid-back.

product_name: Long Sleeve Cut Out Wrap Top
description: Advance your wardrobe with Carbon38’s Long Sleeve Cut Out Wrap Top. The chic, slightly cropped style encases you in our soft, brushed rib knit fabric and features an open ballet back, a front mock-wrap detail, and modern cut-outs along the shoulders. Whether layered over your workout ensemble or worn with jeans, this piece will add some glamour to your day.
A new tank silhouette in the core rib fabric you already know and love. This boyfriend tank is regular length to just hit at the top of the waistband.

The Logo Boyfriend Tee from Aviator Nation has a vintage athletic wear vibe and soft brushed fabric you'll want to live in every day. Slightly cropped with the eye-catching AV logo, this tee seamlessly transitions from daywear to loungewear.

The Agnes Top is a twist-front, full-length tank made from a lightweight ribbed-knit fabrication infused with a hint of stretch. Finished with an invisible zipper at the back of its high neckline for an easy-to-wear construction. The Agnes Top fits close at the chest, straightening out slightly through its body.

The Barre Seamless Tee from Alala boasts a seam-free body-hugging fit and cropped length for pairing with all your high-rise bottoms. This thoughtfully constructed and flattering crop top works for pretty much any activity.
The Open Back Long Sleeve by Alala is made with super-soft pima cotton, featuring a keyhole opening and raw edge details.
An easily layerable instant classic, the Fractal Raglan Tee from Alala is a straight-fitting pullover top with a scoop neckline. Featuring a mesh panel at the back and thumbholes at the sleeve cuffs.

This casual, everyday tank has a loose fit with a crewneck and racerback detail. It features an adidas by Stella McCartney rubber logo print and the soft, stretchy material is made with at least 60% recycled content, making you feel as good about wearing it as you look.

Show off your swing in the Tie Back Polo, constructed with breathable mesh, a tie at back, and a collared neckline for a refined look on and off the court. Pair with the Court Skort for a perfect match.

An exclusive to Carbon38, our Fitted Racer Tank is a contemporary staple that’s anything but basic. Made in our signature Poorboy Rib knit from Italy, the fabric has a lux, soft feel with stretch, so it hugs the body without constricting. The racerback detail and high neckline highlight the shoulders, making it a piece you can wear for workouts, but your best bet would be to get both colors so you have a backup to wear for everything else.

product_name: Adidas By Stella Mccartney Trueprupose Training Longsleeve

description: A new tank silhouette in the core rib fabric you already know and love. This boyfriend tank is regular length to just hit at the top of the waistband.

The Split Sleeve Square Neck Top from Carbon38’s Poorboy Rib knit collection is a marvel. The modern silhouette features a wide square neckline, side slits at the hem, and split sleeves for added breathability and distinctiveness. The Italian fabric is lux yet stretchy, so it feels great on the skin while moving with your body. It’s a piece that highlights the neck and upper back but is also great for layering. You might just need it in both colors.

It's everyone's favorite super soft Spacedye! This best-selling skinny racerback tank features a shelf bra for medium support. With cute cropped silhouette, it's the perfect wardrobe staple. Make it a set with matching legging!

product_name: Long Sleeve Top In Diamond Compression
Long Sleeve Top In Diamond Compression

description: Performance-engineered top with a sleek and boxy cut to define the shoulders and narrow-in on the waist line. Features an invisible front zipper to adjust the neckline collar as desired.

Carbon38’s Wide Scoop Neck Cami is an absolute essential. Made to pair with our Lounge Short or Flare Pant in the same fabrication, adding a ribbed sweater knit set will enhance and advance your loungewear collection. The modern open scoop neckline also makes this tank a fantastic layering piece.

The Oversized Button Up from Carbon38 is an easy-fitting collared top with notches at the side seams and a shirttail hem. Endlessly versatile and layerable, this classic blouse is bound to get plenty of circulation in your wardrobe for years to come.
The Cable Vest is an on-trend and versatile styling piece featuring a unique knit design. The cropped cut and neutral tone make it perfect for fall layering.
This go-anywhere oversized linen shirt is so versatile, you’ll want one in every color we make. B

product_name: Off Shoulder Sweatshirt in French Terry
description: The Off Shoulder Sweatshirt from Carbon38 adds plenty of cool comfort to your wardrobe. With a roomy fit, a slouchy silhouette, and a raw-edged asymmetrical neckline, this French terry sweatshirt keeps things effortlessly laid-back.

product_name: Cut Out Halter Neck Ribbed Cami
description: The Cut Out Halterneck Cami from Carbon38 offers a cropped cut with a tight fit ideal for light to medium impact workouts. With a supportive shelf bra, high neckline, and slim racerback, this active top is cut from our ribbed fabric that's smoothing and soft to the touch.
